definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: Guiding the students to study English taking the advantage of the mother language.
sentences.chinese: 引導學生適當利用固有的本族語優勢學習英語。

sentences.english: So native English speakers will be handicapped.
sentences.chinese: 所以英語本族語言者將會處於弱勢。

sentences.english: To communicate with native speakers is a good way to learn a foreign language well.
sentences.chinese: 經常與說本族語的人交流是學好外語的一種好方法。

sentences.english: I tried speaking to her in her native tongue.
sentences.chinese: 我試着用她的本族語和她說話。

sentences.english: And what exactly does all of this mean for native speakers of English?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，這些變化對英語本族語言者來說意味着什麼呢？

sentences.english: One-year English learning can not qualify you as a native speaker.
sentences.chinese: 只學一年英語不能使你說起英語來像說本族語的人。

sentences.english: Karl marx was born in germany , and german was his native language .
sentences.chinese: 卡爾馬克思生於德國，德語是他的本族語。
